about_the_game:
Forgotten Valor: Prologue introduces our story in the year 2091 and revolves around a time of war where the nation of Vivica in secret produced mass amounts of weapons that utilize around AI. With this new power, they were able to quickly sweep over the smaller nations of Arcadia along with its neighboring nations.

Almost 2 years have passed now and we assume the role of a former Arcadian solider who Vivicans refer to as "The Reaper". With the war still raging on as Vivica invades the bigger nation of Dorfrine, Reaper tries to find out more about himself whilst also trying to free the nation he once stood for.

In this prologue, we learn about the origins of "The Reaper", and bits of his troubled past.

Features

  • Prologue of the story, introducing The Reaper.

  • Custom stealth and assassination mechanics.

  • Battles determined by progression.

This game emphasizes on the inevitable exponential growth of AI and the impacts it may create on society. You become introduced to the world currently ravaged by the exponential growth and see hints of it's dangerous effects on the future.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is about war. So while the blood is fairly limited and pixelated, that and death are present in the game.
